title: Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) Practice Competency Development Program Through Deliberate Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and research methods
context.additional_context: Simplified interfaces and materials designed for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate evidence grades with over 80% accuracy when making actual health-related decisions by applying the EBM framework
Learners demonstrate behavioral changes by applying EBM principles in daily health-related situations at least three times weekly
Learners can critically analyze research literature to identify over three types of bias

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
